Shadow Wing, You (Looking at Spears) lets hurry he just lost 
consiosness, Ramhorn we'll need a mechanic, any suggestions?" 
Lunarpine took Ramhorn under his left shoulder, (Hopefully the others 
will help too) and carried him towards the Ark.
(I gotta go, see ya tomorrow.)

someone 
> to see you."
>

Chordate.  "Who are 
> you?" he directed the question to the female.
